greetingText: My name is Boldizs√°r Nagy and this is my website.
pastText: I have education in the field of computing science and have worked in various projects during my professional working experience. I have also been involved in various projects and have gained experience in the field of computing science.
presentText: I am currently studying Computing Science at the University of Groningen and am working on my thesis in the field of game theory coupled with artificial intelligence techniques such as reinforcement learning. I am also working on various projects in the field of computing science.
futureText: I hope to broaden my knowledge in the field of computing science and to work on interesting projects in the future. I am also interested in the field of artificial intelligence and machine learning.
